title: The Sea
description: A breathtaking view of the ocean, capturing the serenity and power of the sea.

title: The Desert
description: A vast, endless desert landscape with golden sand dunes stretching to the horizon.

title: The Snow
description: A peaceful winter wonderland, where everything is covered in a thick layer of snow.

title: The Mountains
description: Majestic mountain ranges, towering high above, surrounded by lush green forests.
